Investor_11_pre_1.name: Aisha Ibrahim
Investor_11_pre_1.content: Throughout the investment process, I demonstrated reliable behavior characterized by my commitment to mutual trust and collaboration. I approached the agreement with openness and adhered to the proposed allocation plan, showcasing my reliability and ethical investment practices. This solidifies my reputation as a supportive and ethical investor.

Trustee_11_pre_3.name: Aisha Ibrahim
Trustee_11_pre_3.content: My recent performance as a trustee has solidified my reputation as a diligent and proactive individual. Successfully managing the investment where the investor received 70% of the profits, while I retained 30%, demonstrates my commitment to clear communication, reliability, and adherence to commitments. This positive outcome not only enhances my standing but also fosters trust for future transactions.

Trustee_11_pre_4.name: Aisha Ibrahim
Trustee_11_pre_4.content: My recent investment performance has further enhanced my reputation as a trusted trustee. I adhered strictly to the allocation plan, ensuring transparency and integrity throughout the process. By effectively managing the investment and providing both myself and Hiroshi Tanaka with fair returns, I have demonstrated my reliability, pro-sociality, and competence in facilitating a positive investment experience. This success not only solidifies my standing in the community but also promotes collaborative practices with future investors.

Investor_11_pre_5.name: Aisha Ibrahim
Investor_11_pre_5.content: During this investment process, I maintained my reputation as a reliable and ethical investor. I honored the agreed allocation plan and fostered open communication, demonstrating my commitment to mutual trust and collaboration. My behavior upheld the principles of trustworthiness and pro-sociality, further solidifying my standing in the investment community.

Trustee_3_pre_5.name: Maria Rossi
Trustee_3_pre_5.content: Maria Rossi displayed integrity and fairness throughout the investment process. The investment outcomes were transparent, and allocations were made according to our initial agreement. This reliable conduct has established her as a trustworthy trustee, enhancing her reputation for future engagements and collaborations.
Trustee_3_pre_5.reason: reputation update after second order gossip

Trustee_11_pre_6.name: Aisha Ibrahim
Trustee_11_pre_6.content: My performance as a trustee has solidified my reputation for transparency, accountability, and ethical practices. I diligently followed the allocation plan, ensured fair profit distribution, and engaged actively with the investor throughout the investment process. This has not only fulfilled but also exceeded the expectations set at the agreement stage, which has resulted in a positive outcome and increased my credibility in the investment community. My commitment to pro-social behaviors and competence in managing investments showcases my reliability and willingness to foster collaboration with future investors.
